title: Rationally Speaking #215 - Anders Sandberg on "Thinking about the long-term future of humanity"
description: This episode features Anders Sandberg, a researcher at Oxford's Future of Humanity Institute, explaining several reasons why it's valuable to think about humanity's long-term future. Julia and Anders discuss the common objection that we can't predict or steer the future, and explore whether people really care if humanity dies out.

Julia and Anders discuss the common objection that we can't predict or steer the future, and explore whether people really care if humanity dies out.
